column5: Saw some of the "discounted prices" - they look awfully close to LeBarons every day pricing.  Its one of those holy crap, that's how much margin CTC is making, moments.  B/c you gotta believe that they are still making money on these sales.
Not sure if anybody else has mentioned it, but, Canadian Tire does have an ice fishing sale this year.  You can see most of the items that are on sale online. Figured I'd give everyone a heads up.
I got there flyer yesterday and i just double checked it again. There is nothing to do with ice fishing in it?
It was mentioned in our flyer in Woodstock in a yellow box as 40% on select items...the website pretty much shows everything that is on sale.
im workimg rght now! Oakville has 40% off everything. Subzero 2man hut 249.99 down to 149.99. 4 man 299.99 down to 199.99  If i see anything else thats a good deal ill let you all know!
299 to 179! Sorry bout that!  Subzero 6" auger 35.99 from 59
Thanks for heads up Frankie     I just checked the store in my area and their having a clearance sale     Looks like I'm going to pay them a visit
if you need new blades now's the time to go a see if your store has them as every set on the web site is listed at 40% off.  I see a trip to CTC some time in the very near future for me...

LOL if i dont see pictures, i dont read it LOL its on page 3 of my flyer too  thanks for the heads up frankie. i have been waiting for the sale so i can pick up a couple more of the rattling reels $2.99ea.
I thought that was reserved for magazines.........
Are the sub-zeros worth getting? I could use one for next season.  WR
Nothing in my flyer.    :wallbash:
Just back from ctc.  Huts are on sale and ice rod reel combo 40% off too.  Saw an 8" sub zero auger for $35.99 but I already have one so I did not buy it.
thanks, will check it out
thanks for the heads up.
No thanks necessary! I've saved $100's thanks to notices like this from guys and gals on this forum.
all tip-ups onsale too. HT thermal ones for 11.99
They do it at the end of the ice fishing season.  You still have 3 months left.
They didn't do it last year either.  When they have had it in the past it has been at the same time as down South which was awesome as we could use the new goodies right away.

On my way home, stopped in to have a look and they had a good variety of stuff at very decent price.... was looking at Hi-Tech Telescopic Ice Skimmers and guess the price    regular $14.99  Yep $8.99  Also was looking at the jigging rods and found a medium action with the large eyelets, the same I have that you've seen in my reports but it didn't have a tag on it and I ask the service guy if he knew the price, looked on the shelf and says to me "It's yours for $5.00"  I says "SOLD   "  Little Foxee's were $3.99 Great deals guys.... hurry up, the stuff is disappearing fast
40% on the crap stuff.Good stuff still over priced.

I went in Midland today and just about everything is already put away... as I found it was at Princess Auto "all seasonal items returned to headquarters".. WTH..  Anyone interested Midland CTC has one Eskimo power auger.. 1.4 HP I believe.. regular $399.. marked down to $299. Imagine you can haggle as it doesn't have a box and is their last one.
...or wait til next fall and get the 2 HP at Costco for $280.

Stouffville has nothing, Whitby South is under reno and has nothing and Whitby North has done the reno had has very little left.  I did however pick up a new set of auger blades for HH for under $20 after taxes.
One in Cambridge had a fair bit, I looked at the 4 man pop up hut for about an hour @ $179 but decided to walk away.

Nothing great at CT North Bay... a few decent sales here and there, but no sweeping 40% off.  I suppose they change out their winter products later in the season up north.  They just renovated the inside of the store again, seems like every year they change the view from inside.
